title: Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People               Captain John Smith   Learn about the trail's namesake figure and his enduring legacy.        Powhatan   The Paramount Chief of the Virginia area known as Powhatan who played a pivotal role in the Jamestown Colony        American Indian Tribes Today   It is a common misconception that American Indians no longer live in the Chesapeake Bay area. In fact there are tens of thousands!             Captain John Smith  Powhatan The American Indians American Indian Tribes Today
